title: odam-data-resource
description: Description of an ODAM data resource

profile.title: odam-data-resource
profile.description: odam-data-resource profile is an extension of the tabular data resource profile

name.title: Name
name.description: An identifier string. Lower case characters with `_` are allowed.
name.context: This is ideally a url-usable and human-readable name. Name `SHOULD` be invariant, meaning it `SHOULD NOT` change when its parent descriptor is updated.

description.title: Description
description.description: A text description. Markdown is encouraged.

path.title: Path
path.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..
path.context: Implementations need to negotiate the type of path provided, and dereference the data accordingly.

anyTermName.title: CV Term Name
anyTermName.description: Short description of the controlled vocabulary

csvddfVersion.title: CSV Dialect schema version
csvddfVersion.description: A number to indicate the schema version of CSV Dialect. Version 1.0 was named CSV Dialect Description Format and used different field names.

delimiter.title: Delimiter
delimiter.description: A character sequence to use as the field separator.

doubleQuote.title: Double Quote
doubleQuote.description: Specifies the handling of quotes inside fields.
doubleQuote.context: If Double Quote is set to true, two consecutive quotes must be interpreted as one.

lineTerminator.title: Line Terminator
lineTerminator.description: Specifies the character sequence that must be used to terminate rows.

quoteChar.title: Quote Character
quoteChar.description: Specifies a one-character string to use as the quoting character.

escapeChar.title: Escape Character
escapeChar.description: Specifies a one-character string to use as the escape character.

skipInitialSpace.title: Skip Initial Space
skipInitialSpace.description: Specifies the interpretation of whitespace immediately following a delimiter. If false, whitespace immediately after a delimiter should be treated as part of the subsequent field.

header.title: Header
header.description: Specifies if the file includes a header row, always as the first row in the file.

commentChar.title: Comment Character
commentChar.description: Specifies a character sequence causing the rest of the line after it to be ignored.

caseSensitiveHeader.title: Case Sensitive Header
caseSensitiveHeader.description: Specifies if the case of headers is meaningful.
caseSensitiveHeader.context: Use of case in source CSV files is not always an intentional decision. For example, should "CAT" and "Cat" be considered to have the same meaning.

format.title: Format
format.description: The file format of this resource.

mediatype.title: Media Type
mediatype.description: The media type of this resource. Can be any valid media type listed with [IANA](https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml).

encoding.title: Encoding
encoding.description: The file encoding of this resource.

tableSchema.title: Table Schema
tableSchema.description: A Table Schema for this resource, compliant with the [Table Schema](/tableschema/) specification.

fields.description: An `array` of Table Schema Field objects.

categories.description: An `array` of Table Schema Category objects.

constraints.title: Constraints
constraints.description: The following constraints are supported for `string` fields.

required.description: Indicates whether a property must have a value for each instance.
required.context: An empty string is considered to be a missing value.

unique.description: When `true`, each value for the property `MUST` be unique.

tableSchemaPrimaryKey.description: A primary key is a field name or an array of field names, whose values `MUST` uniquely identify each row in the table.

fields.description: Fields that make up the primary key.

identifier.description: name of the identifier field (column name). i.e same as primaryKey

joinkey.description: name of the identifier field (column name) that serves to link with its father file i.e same as foreignKey
